def test_history(ip: str):
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE}/devices/{ip}/history", timeout=5)
    data = r.json()
    print("IP:", data["ip"])
    print("Num windows:", len(data["history"]))
if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_alerts()
    test_devices()
    test_history("192.168.8.135")  # swap with one from /devices

label: BASE
peekOfCode:
BASE = "http://127.0.0.1:8000"
def test_alerts():
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE}/alerts", timeout=5)
    print("Status:", r.status_code)
    data = r.json()
    print("Keys:", data.keys())
    print("First alert:", data["alerts"][0] if data["alerts"] else None)
def test_devices():
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE}/devices", timeout=5)
    print("Devices:", r.json()["devices"])

label: build_windows
peekOfCode:
def build_windows(src_path=SRC, freq="1min"):
    df = pd.read_csv(src_path, parse_dates=["time"])
    if df.empty:
        OUT.write_text(""); return pd.DataFrame()
    df["minute"] = df["time"].dt.floor(freq)
    g = (df.groupby(["client_ip","minute"])
           .agg(qpm=("domain","count"),
                uniq=("domain","nunique"),
                avg_len=("domain", lambda s: s.str.len().mean()))
           .reset_index().fillna(0))
